ratings.comment: Don't even try to take notes because the content she uses on exams and quizzes is nothing that we learned. There were multiple occasions where I was asked a question on an exam and I had never heard or seen the content before, and I read the book along with attending every lecture. She uses irrelevant examples and they do not make sense at all.

Belkis is not the primary teacher for this class, and it really shows. She uses outdated examples in her lectures and isn't the clearest on some ideas, but the topics covered in this class aren't difficult so it is not that bad. The annoying part was the group project and paper due just before the final exam. Show up to class and this won't be bad.

She cares about her students but her experience teaching seems a little questionable. She has a PhD in Econ and clearly knows a lot about the subject. The class wasn't  difficult as long as you do all the assignments and attend lecture. The end of the semester was annoying because of the group paper, presentation, and then the final on top of that.
